name: FunctionalMRI
title: Functional MRI
description: This value set may undergo changes until the HL7 Multiple Chronic Care FHIR IG is formally published in 2024.
purpose: (Clinical Focus: These terms may be used when reporting a result associated with Functional MRI or may be used to represent the procedure.),(Data Element Scope: The intent of this set of values is to identify Functional MRI performed or resulted on a patient or identify patients who have had Functional MRI performed or resulted.),(Inclusion Criteria: Includes LOINC codes specific to the Functional MRI tests.),(Exclusion Criteria: Terms not representative of observable encoded terms that may have values indicating Functional MRI Results.)

contains.display: Functional MR Brain for motor function
